Title: All the Birds Have Flown South
Director: Joshua H. Miller, Miles B. Miller
Writer: Joshua H. Miller, Miles B. Miller
Actors: Joey Lauren Adams, Dallas Roberts, Paul Sparks, Natalie Canerday
Plot: After the death of his overbearing Mother, a sheltered man attempts to win the affection of a degenerate waitress by caring for her terminally ill and abusive husband. Soon all three lives ...
